```{r}
library(tidyverse)
Online_Retail <- read_csv("Online_Retail.csv")
head(Online_Retail)
```
# NUMBER 1
```{r}
Online_Retail %>%
count(Country, sort = TRUE) %>% summarise(Country, Counts = n, Percent = n/sum(n)*100) %>% head(4)

```
#NUMBER 2
```{r}
transaction_value <- as.data.frame(Online_Retail$Quantity*Online_Retail$UnitPrice)
Online_Retail <- cbind(Online_Retail, transaction_value) 
Online_Retail <- rename(Online_Retail, "Transaction Value" = `Online_Retail$Quantity * Online_Retail$UnitPrice`)
```
# NUMBER 3
```{r}
Online_Retail %>%
count(Country, `Transaction Value`, sort = TRUE) %>% summarise(Country, `Transaction Value` *n)
```
